data.name: Tower Escape
data.detailed_description:
The stupid elves have captured you, the most powerful sorcerer in the kingdom, and locked you in a tower! You must escape by summoning minions and guiding them to the exit!

Tower Escape is a "Reverse Tower Defense" game where you guide a magical snake through a maze so your minions can follow it. Your minions pick up treasure and powerful enhancements along the way to aid you in your escape.

Join our Discord to make suggestions or report bugs!
https://discord.gg/2AwK6wmAUh

Features

  • Summon new minions for your team and harness their unique abilities to escape the maze
  • Manage your minions with upgrades and equipment
  • Discover powerful synergies between minions
  • Avoid Defenders' special attacks and abilities
  • Collect powerful trinkets to enhance your run
  • Unlock hidden secrets: minions, levels, and more
  • Navigate procedural mazes for a unique experience every time
  • Earn Steam Achievements
  • Store your progress with Steam Cloud Saves

Gameplay

Assess the enemy's defenses in planning mode with the threat heatmap layer to choose your path ...


... then create a safe path by guiding your snake ...


... and your minions will follow it!


Combine minions into more powerful versions.


Buy more minions with the treasure you collect. Build a deck with ability synergies, and rearrange your spawn order to build the perfect wave!

data.short_description: Escape the tower by summoning minions and guiding them to the exit! Tower Escape is a "Reverse Tower Defense" game where you guide a snake through a maze, then your minions follow it as they pick up treasure and keys to the next level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
